snippet: The Open lets fans in free the week before the tournament to watch qualifying matches, but one of New York’s best-kept secrets is that the top players are also in attendance and practicing.
abstract: Tennis fans enjoy free access to qualifying matches in week leading up to the United States Open in New York City, sometimes catching glimpses of stars like Andy Murray and Maria Sharapova.
lead_paragraph: The Open lets fans in free the week before the tournament to watch qualifying matches, but one of New York’s best-kept secrets is that the top players are also in attendance and practicing.

headline.main: A Close Look at Murray and Sharapova Preparing for the U.S. Open (Psst: It’s Free)
headline.print_headline: U.S. Open FansWatch Murray and Sharapova Up Close (Psst: It’s Free)

keywords.value: Billie Jean King National Tennis Center
keywords.name: organizations
